function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green and sustainable construction in the housing industry","Impact":"Difficulty in competing with achievements in public architecture, potential for economic stagnation","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize green and sustainable construction in the housing industry","Technologies":"Energy-efficient building materials, green building certifications","People":"Residential communities, construction companies","Owner":"Government, construction companies"},{"Description":"Lack of safe housing during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to the spread of COVID-19, survival challenges for residents","Mitigation":"Invest in safe and affordable housing, improve housing policies and regulations","Technologies":"Smart home technology for health monitoring, affordable and sustainable building materials","People":"Residents, policymakers","Owner":"Government, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary research on the impact of housing policies on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Limited understanding of factors influencing COVID-19 spread in relation to housing policies, missed opportunities for effective interventions","Mitigation":"Encourage interdisciplinary research on the interaction of housing policies and COVID-19, promote data-driven policy formulation","Technologies":"Data analytics for understanding housing and COVID-19 trends, GIS mapping for spatial analysis","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government"}]}
